name: Bury the Knife
description:
Short prototype about trying to find a way to get rid of something you probably can't. 

Press 'E' to interact with animals in the forest. 

This was made for Prototype Studio under the theme 8mm. 

Accreditation: 

"Calm Synthesizer, B.wav" by InspectorJ 
Hesitant mysterious glockenspiel tune  by pogmothoin
